message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000. I'm confident it can significantly benefit you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's way outside my budget. I'd be willing to consider something closer to $10,000.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate you moving a bit, but $18,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.  Could you do something closer to $12,000?
Bob, I'm seeing a gap between our valuations. I'm willing to make another move to $15,000.  This is already quite a reduction, reflecting my desire to see this benefit you.
Alice, I understand this product has value, but I have a firm budget. If we can make a deal at $13,000, I'm ready to close today.
